abstract: A 58-year-old man with liposarcoma originating from the right paratesticular area was reported. Histologically, liposarcoma showed a well-differentiated sclerosing type. Coexistence of transitional cell carcinoma of the urinary bladder and liposarcoma was also revealed. The cases of paratesticular liposarcoma in the literature are briefly reviewed.
title: Paratesticular liposarcoma: coexistence with urinary bladder cancer.
